page.title: 10RECREATION
page.content: Halstead {Sports Centre }is next to the Ramsey School. Inside the sports centre there are two squash courts and a large gym hall. In the big hall you can play tennis and badminton. If you go to the sports centre at half term or in the Summer holidays you can go and have some fun on the jumping castle. They have a big basket with skipping ropes, netballs, footballs and shuttle cocks. Sometimes they have the big trampoline out. There are trampoline and judo lessons. In the evening you can play squash,table tennis,tennis,badminton and many more. In the holidays children can go to the sports centre all morning from ten o'clock until midday. There are ladies to look after you and play games with you.
